title: Premiere: Cadence Kid – Hold On Me
body:
With the summer months just around the corner, it’s high time to start preparing those playlists perfect for the warmer, longer days.

This new jam from **Cadence Kid** is an absolute surefire winner, the ideal mix of upbeat melodies and tastefully cheesy lyrics, all soaked in a healthy dose of Phoenix indebted pop charisma. Check out _Hold On Me_ below, released 3rd June 2016.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
